The Spend

Caddick Construction (NW) Ltd is South Ribble's third-largest supplier at £13.8 million (9.5% of total spend). This substantial construction expenditure points to significant capital investment programmes within the borough.

Context

South Ribble has been investing in leisure and community facilities, with Alliance Leisure Services also receiving £8.5 million (5.9%). Together, these two suppliers account for 15.4% of all council spending — suggesting a major programme of physical infrastructure improvement.

For a council serving 111,600 residents, £22.3 million in construction and leisure development represents a significant commitment to community facilities. Whether this represents good value depends on the assets delivered and their long-term revenue generation potential.

Search for Caddick transactions or Alliance Leisure transactions to see the individual payments.
